page.title: 11SATURDAYS IN ST.BRELADE
page.content: My name is Nicola Maddox. I am 14. I am writing about what I do on Saturdays. I start my mornings at 8.00 when I get up. Then I have a wash and get dressed. At 8.15 I get my breakfast, which consists of cornflakes and coffee. At 8.30 I go over to the shops to get our lunch which consists of sausage rolls, crisps, a drink and biscuits. My Mum takes me to pick Susan up at 9.00. We go to the stable where we get the horses in and tack up. There are usually 4 rides which I take round. 12.00 is lunch-time. We groom and tack up before 1.30 when we go out on the roads before taking the horses to the fields to graze. When I get in at 4 p.m. I shower and watch television until 11.30 p.m. - bed-time!
